statements: SELECT * FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM user_actions WHERE action_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, action_description FROM user_actions WHERE action_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT action_id, user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_type IN ('like', 'comment') ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;
SELECT action_id, user_id, action_description FROM user_actions WHERE action_description LIKE '%search%' ORDER BY action_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 2 AND action_type = 'share' ORDER BY user_id ASC, action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_actions WHERE action_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND action_timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserActions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM UserActions WHERE id = 100;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_id, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserActions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM UserActions WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM UserActions;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_description, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM interaction_logging ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_description, log_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 2 AND log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'login' AND action_description LIKE '%success%';
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE user_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY user_id ASC, action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_description FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_description, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'login' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_description FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'logout' AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_description, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id ASC, action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_description, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND action_timestamp < '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM user_actions;
SELECT action_id, user_id, action_type FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_timestamp, accessed_resource FROM platform_access_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM user_login_logs WHERE logout_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM user_actions WHERE action_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM user_login_logs WHERE user_id = 3 AND logout_timestamp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, accessed_resource FROM platform_access_logs WHERE access_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_actions;
SELECT action_id, user_id, action_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT action_description FROM user_actions WHERE action_type='login' AND action_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'post' AND activity_details->>'likes' >= '100';
SELECT action_id, user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT action_type, action_description FROM user_actions WHERE action_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND action_timestamp < '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE action_type = 'Login' AND user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(action_id) AS total_actions FROM user_actions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 10;
SELECT user_id, MAX(action_timestamp) AS last_action_timestamp FROM user_actions GROUP BY user_id;
